name: One Hour Left
description:
In this game you have to try yourself as a spy on an enemy base. You have only one hour to prevent the launch of secret rockets on your home country.
You have to communicate with enemy soldiers and look for ways to achieve your goal. You may need completely different things, so you have to be as careful as possible. But remember that you only have one hour left.
In this game you have to look for things that will help you solve puzzles to complete the mission. You also need to communicate with other soldiers at the base to find out all the secrets from them. You need to be as careful as possible and pay attention to every little thing, to every phrase said by the enemy. Your mission is quite complex and will require attention and intelligence. You may have to bribe soldiers to overcome some obstacles, but be careful with this.
